title: travelplanner: Can you help me craft a 3-day travel plan for two people, starting from South Bend and ending in Atlanta, from March 6th to March 8th, 2022? Our budget is $1,500. We require accommodations that allow parties and we're interested in tasting local Mediterranean, American, Chinese, and Indian cuisines. Additionally, we are not planning on driving ourselves. (a541d0af1198df70)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.name: accommodation_search

chat_history.content:
Here is a travel plan for a 3-day trip from South Bend to Atlanta, from March 6th to March 8th, 2022, catering to your preferences and budget: 

## Day 1: March 6th

**Flight:**
- Departing from South Bend, you can catch a flight to Atlanta at 18:02 and arrive at 19:56 on Flight F3636293, with an actual flight time of 1 hour and 54 minutes. Alternatively, you can opt for earlier flights at 05:57 (F3639039) or 12:30 (F3648988), if you wish to start your day earlier. 

**Evening:**
Since you'll arrive in Atlanta on the same day, you might want to consider checking into your accommodation and getting some rest. I found a couple of options that allow parties and fit your budget:
- 'Unique 2BR Apartment' - a unique and spacious apartment located close to public transport, with a bright and modern design. It accommodates 3 people for $394 for 2 nights.
- 'Spacious private room close St. Barnabas Hospital' - a cozy private room that offers a budget-friendly option for $144 for 2 nights. 

## Day 2: March 7th

**Morning:**
Start your day by exploring some of Atlanta's popular attractions:
- Visit the Atlanta Botanical Garden, located at 1345 Piedmont Ave NE, Atlanta, GA 30309. The garden offers a peaceful retreat with beautiful flora and unique plant collections. 
- Head over to the World of Coca-Cola, situated at 121 Baker St NW, Atlanta, GA 30313. Here, you can learn about the history of Coca-Cola, taste different beverages, and even create your own Coke! 

**Afternoon:** 
After a morning of sightseeing, refuel with some food. Here are some restaurant options for tasting various cuisines:
- 'Saffron' - a highly rated restaurant serving tea and cafe-style dishes, specializing in seafood. 
- 'Caboose X Cafe & Lounge' - a unique spot offering a mix of bakery, fast food, Chinese, and Indian cuisine. 
- 'Pizza Central' - a popular choice for pizza lovers, also serving cafe, bakery, BBQ, fast food, Chinese, and Indian dishes. 

**Evening:**
In the evening, you can continue exploring Atlanta's vibrant nightlife:
- Visit Piedmont Park, a beautiful green space in the heart of the city, offering a peaceful escape. 
- Explore the High Museum of Art, featuring a diverse collection of art, including American, African American, and decorative arts. 

## Day 3: March 8th

**Morning:**
On your last day, you can opt for a more relaxed start. Consider visiting some of Atlanta's interesting museums and attractions:
- The Georgia Aquarium, one of the largest aquariums in the world, is an excellent choice for a unique underwater experience. 
- SkyView Atlanta offers a great view of the city from a unique Ferris wheel experience. 
- Centennial Olympic Park is a beautiful green space with a lake and a great place to relax and take in the city's atmosphere. 

**Afternoon:**
For your last meal in Atlanta, here are some restaurant suggestions:
- 'Chaina Ram Sindhi Confectioners' - a delightful spot serving desserts, pizza, BBQ, Mediterranean, and seafood. 
- 'Sethis Restaurant & Barbeque' - a popular choice for pizza, American cuisine, bakery, cafe, Indian, and seafood. 
- 'Punjab Restaurant' - a great option for desserts, BBQ, Chinese, Mediterranean, and seafood. 

**Evening:**
To end your trip, you can head back home or to your next destination. 

This 3-day itinerary offers a mix of sightseeing, culinary adventures, and exploration of Atlanta's vibrant culture, all while keeping within your budget and preferences. Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
